feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Flood Warning issued September 09 at 11:51AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR A GLACIER-DAMMED LAKE OUTBURST NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT MONDAY FOR KENAI RIVER NEAR COOPER LANDING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by the Snow Glacier-dammed lake outburst continues. * WHERE...Kenai River near Cooper Landing through Skilak Lake. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT Monday.

entry.summary: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR A GLACIER-DAMMED LAKE OUTBURST IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT MONDAY ALONG KENAI RIVER... * WHAT...Flooding caused by a glacier-dammed lake outburst is expected. * WHERE...Kenai River near below Skilak Lake, including Kenai Keys. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT Monday.
